definition: produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
details:
verb
- produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
= synonyms: pulse
- expand and contract rhythmically
= synonyms: pulse
- move with or as if with a regular alternating motion
= example: move with or as if with a regular alternating motion
= synonyms: beat
